About me

Who I am and more info about my education, skills, projects...

Me

I’m Braulio Vargas López and I’m 21. I’m finishing my bachelor on Computer Engineering student of University of Granada, interested on machine learning, data science, computer vision, photography… etc.

Education

Bachelor in Computer Engineering, specialized on Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence at University of Granada.

Skills

Programming

My three favorite programming languages are Python, Haskell and C++ and my main language is Python.

Tools

I work with a lot of tools, but in the last two years, I’ve specialized on OpenCV, scikit-learn, NumPy and other Python tools for machine learning and datascience, like Pandas, ggplot2, etc.
